title: Unseen Shirtless Pics Of Shahrukh Khan's Son Aryan And Saif's Son Ibrahim
text:
Posted by: Priyanka Prasad Published: Thursday, October 22, 2015, 17:19 [IST] 
Shahrukh Khan 's son, Aryan Khan has grown up to be quite a handsome boy! Infact, he is so hot and good looking that he can give his father a run for the money.Aryan is currently studying in London and is often seen making trips to his home in Mumbai. During his recent trip, the star kid was spotted at the airport along with his sister, sporting a gothic look.Aryan looked hot and happening, for sure a star in the making! At such a young age, he is very conscious of his body and is seen working out! There have been many instances where Aryan has even posted his shirtless selfies on his Instagram account. 
CAUGHT: Alia Bhatt-Sidharth Malhotra Watch Shaandaar Movie Together Aryan sports killer abs which will make all the girls go ga-ga over him. If you thought he is the only star kid who is out there posting his shirtless pics, then you thought wrong! Saif Ali Khan 's son Ibrahim Ali Khan is also one good looking chap who is seen showing off his body in shirtless pics!
